law.catch_line: A party or support enforcement agency seeking to modify, or to modify and enforce, a child support o...
law.text: A party or support enforcement agency seeking to modify, or to modify and enforce, a child support order issued in another state shall register that order in this State in the same manner provided in Subpart A of this part if the order has not been registered. A complaint for modification may be filed at the same time as a request for registration, or later. The pleading must specify the grounds for modification.
